oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: UNICEF tour - Tokyo, Japan - 1972 - part 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part four of a 1972 UNICEF fundraiser tour performance in Tokyo, Japan at Budo Kahn Hall. Featuring Tex Ritter (host), Freddy Weller (performer), Connie Smith (performer), and Ray Sanders (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Freddy Weller; Connie Smith; Ray Sanders
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Freddy Weller introduces the next tune -- (00:14) Games People Play (Freddy Weller) -- (03:19) Tex Ritter encores Weller, and introduces Connie Smith -- (04:13) Just One Time (Connie Smith) -- (06:42) I Never Stopped Lovin' You (Connie Smith) -- (09:27) Louisiana Man (Connie Smith) -- (12:05) Once A Day, Everyday, All Day Long (Connie Smith) -- (14:34) Connie Smith thanks the audience and introduces the next tune -- (14:45) How Great Thou Art (Connie Smith) -- (19:00) Ritter thanks Connie Smith and talks about the beautiful women of Japan, and introduces Ray Sanders -- (21:15) Let's Blame It On Rosie (Ray Sanders) -- (23:15) Sanders thanks the audience and introduces the next tune -- (23:40) Beer Drinkin' Music (Ray Sanders) -- (26:03) Ray Sanders introduces the next tune -- (26:12) All I Ever Need Is You (Ray Sanders)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: UNICEF.; Weller, Freddy, 1947-; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Smith, Connie, 1941-; Sanders, Ray (Vocalist)
